channel.title: Budgeting on FinanceCraftedSheets
channel.description: Recent content in Budgeting on FinanceCraftedSheets

item.title: 5 Excel Budget Templates That Actually Work (2026 Guide)
item.description: Discover 5 proven Excel budget templates that simplify personal finance management in 2026. Downloadable templates available at FinanceCraftedSheets Etsy shop.

item.title: How to Build a Financial Dashboard in Google Sheets
item.description: Create a powerful personal finance dashboard in Google Sheets with this step-by-step guide. Includes tips for linking accounts, visualizing data, and using pre-built templates.

item.title: How to Track Your Debt Payoff Progress (Free Spreadsheet Template)
item.description: Download our free debt payoff tracker spreadsheet and learn proven methods to visualize your debt journey. Includes Etsy template options for advanced tracking.

item.title: The 50/30/20 Rule: Does It Actually Work?
item.description: A realistic evaluation of the popular 50/30/20 budgeting rule. Discover when it works, when it fails, and better alternatives for different financial situations.

item.title: The Complete Guide to Tracking Your Net Worth (Why and How)
item.description: Master net worth tracking with our proven system. Includes free Excel template from FinanceCraftedSheets Etsy shop for automatic calculations.

item.title: YNAB vs Excel: Which Budget Tool Is Right for You?
item.description: Compare YNAB and Excel for budgeting needs. Pros, cons, and honest recommendations for 2026's best budget tool.

item.title: Avalanche vs Snowball: Which Debt Payoff Method Actually Works for You
item.description: Math comparison of debt payoff methods with real numbers and timelines. Why psychology matters more than optimization. How to choose based on your personality.

item.title: How to Track Spending Without Apps: The 10-Minute Weekly Review
item.description: Manual spending tracking methods using spreadsheets and the weekly review habit that keeps budgets on track. Why manual tracking forces behavioral change better than automation.

item.title: Zero-Based Budgeting: Every Dollar Has a Job
item.description: Learn what zero-based budgeting is and why it works so well for debt payoff. Step-by-step setup guide with real numbers from someone who paid off $43k in debt using this method.
